title: As much as we all are hyped for Overwatch because of the gameplay, lets be honest...
body:
The secondary hype is because its back to old-school Blizzard Waifus and hotties making a return, instead of being stifled by people like Metzen and whoever the hell is in charge of SCII. We've got quite a lineup coming too;

http://imgur.com/RqjUWVM.jpg
http://imgur.com/DYWLxTO.jpg
http://imgur.com/JFZGZ8D.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/3D1h7VU.jpg
http://imgur.com/bfclEUD.jpg
http://imgur.com/IY1Pmtz.jpg
http://imgur.com/fZRC5Ft.jpg

Heck, I even include Zarya, because the Paragon doesn't discriminate against ladies like that.
http://i.imgur.com/pf2dtiw.gif
